src_original: tena cāvabhāsena yā api lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭā andhakāratamisrā yatremau candrasūryau
evaṃmaharddhikāvevaṃ mahānubhāvāvevaṃ maheśākhyau ābhayā ābhāṃ varṇenaṃ varṇaṃ tejasā

tatra ye sattvā upapannāste svakasvakamapi bāhuṃ prasāritaṃ na paśyanti sma,  tatrāpi tasmin samaye mahata udārasyāvabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvo 'bhut /  ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāste tenāvabhāsena parisphuṭāḥ samānā anyonyaṃ paśyanti sma /  anyonyaṃ saṃjānante sma /
evaṃ cāhuḥ - anye 'pi kila bhoḥ sattvā ihopapannāḥ,
